name: Pyramids of Death
description:
Pyramids of Death :

Traverse the dark corridors as quickly as possible or take your time to explore and search the hidden treasures.

Resist the attacks from the guards of the tombs and find the exit towards the light.

Such are the challenges to take up to pass from levels in levels, more dangerous the ones than the others.

You can use your keyboard / mouse or your Xbox controller

Download the demonstration version below to free traverse the four first levels of the game in challenge mode and exploration mode.

The full version will see the diversity of the enemies and the traps to increase progressively as well as new character abilities.
